title: BRING BACK DOMINION
body: What ever happened to Dominion? Pls if anybody is out there, get it back 2 us in OCE

replies.body: Dominion is perma-dead my friend. not on any regions sadly :(

Dominion was completely removed a couple years back, much like Twisted Treeline is/was, it was under played, the chances of it coming back are slim to none.

They did very briefly run a "Definitely Not Dominion" Rotating Game Mode, but it still proved to be underplayed, it's probably not coming back

if they ever did bring it back I hope it's got extra stuff to make it feel like a mobile (because champs can move) monopoly game + all the hide n seek n mind fook moments lol or mebe roller coaster (not a literal 1) urf with 1 mode 4 new people and 1 for not new people. Or like a GoT train tracks
